att: please try to add fun things to make the app better for everyone . thank you

challenges.1: Write down 3 things you're grateful for
challenges.3: Read for 10 minutes before bed at night
challenges.5: Take a walk rain or shine
challenges.6: Get up 20 minutes earlier than your regular time
challenges.7: organize a space in your home
challenges.8: Write a letter to your future self
challenges.9: Do a Random acts of kindness
challenges.10: Complete a Crossword or Sudoku Puzzle
challenges.18: Take a photo of something that makes you happy
challenges.19: Donate one thing from your home
challenges.24: Eat meals without your phone or TV
challenges.25: Take a walk without your phone
challenges.28: Get in touch with one former classmate or childhood friend per day
challenges.31: Visit a new area of your town
challenges.32: Answer questions left by people in reddit.
challenges.33: Tell a family member you love them
challenges.35: Grow an herb or vegetable garden
challenges.39: No screen time an hour before bedtime
